languages.text: "Mercy! I'll say whatever you want, but please, stop hitting me!"
languages.original_text: "Пощады! Я сознаюсь в чем угодно, только перестаньте бить!"

traits.locale_text: "Mercy! I'll say whatever you want, just please, stop hitting me!"
"Mercy! I'll say whatever you want, just please, stop hitting me!"
"Mercy! I'll say whatever you want, but please, stop hitting me!"
"Mercy! I'll say whatever you want, but please, stop hitting me!"
"Mercy! I'll say whatever you want, but please, stop hitting me!"
"Mercy! I'll say whatever you want, but please, stop hitting me!"

languages.text: "Пощады! Я сознаюсь в чем угодно, только перестаньте бить!"
« Pitié ! J'avouerai tout ce que vous voudrez, mais je vous en supplie, arrêtez de me taper dessus ! »
languages.original_text: "Mercy! I'll say whatever you want, but please, stop hitting me!"

traits.locale_text: « Pitié ! J'avouerai tout ce que vous voudrez, mais je vous en supplie, arrêtez de me taper dessus ! »

languages.text: «¡Piedad! ¡Diré lo que quieras que diga, pero, por favor, deja de pegarme!».
languages.original_text: "Mercy! I'll say whatever you want, but please, stop hitting me!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Piedad! ¡Diré lo que quieras que diga, pero, por favor, deja de pegarme!».

languages.text: “饶命啊！你们想让我说什么，我就说什么！只求你们别再打我了！”
languages.original_text: "Mercy! I'll say whatever you want, but please, stop hitting me!"

traits.locale_text: “饶命啊！你们想让我说什么，我就说什么！只求你们别再打我了！”

languages.text: 「お許しください！知りたいことを何でも言います。なので、私を殴るのをおやめください！」
languages.original_text: "Mercy! I'll say whatever you want, but please, stop hitting me!"

traits.locale_text: 「お許しください！知りたいことを何でも言います。なので、私を殴るのをおやめください！」

languages.text: "Gnade! Ich sage, was immer Ihr wollt, aber hört bitte auf, mich zu schlagen!"
languages.original_text: "Mercy! I'll say whatever you want, but please, stop hitting me!"

traits.locale_text: "Gnade! Ich sage, was immer Ihr wollt, aber hört bitte auf, mich zu schlagen!"

languages.text: "Merhamet edin! Ne istiyorsanız söylerim ama lütfen daha fazla vurmayın!"
languages.original_text: "Mercy! I'll say whatever you want, but please, stop hitting me!"
